alert.note: Alert for Baker; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 7:49PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilchrist, western Alachua, western Baker, western Union, Columbia, Suwannee, Hamilton, Echols, south central Ware, southeastern Clinch and western Charlton Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 748 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking broken line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Jasper to near Cross City. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Live Oak, Jasper, Trenton, Jennings, White Springs, Bell, Fargo, Worthington Spring and Statenville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua
